entry.title: A disturbing, viral Twitter thread reveals how AI-powered insurance can go wrong
entry.quote: Lemonade tweeted about what it means to be an AI-first insurance company. It left a sour taste in many customers’ mouths.

entry.title: NYC’s School Algorithms Cement Segregation. This Data Shows How
entry.quote: What both students couldn’t help but notice was how many White students shuffled up to one floor and how many students of color moved on to the others. Park Slope was 10 percent White during the 2019–20 school year, compared to 46 percent at Millennium. “I enjoy most of my classes,” Grumbach-Bloom, who is White, said, “and I think the main thing that’s missing is a diverse group of students in my classes.”

entry.title: Vizio makes nearly as much money from ads and data as it does from TVs
entry.quote: Those low-priced TVs are a vehicle for advertising and they can track what you're watching.

entry.title: Mars in 8K
entry.quote: 8K images from the surface of Mars made by Curiosity Rover.

entry.title: a day in the life of an engineer working from home
entry.quote: I'm sorry I'm late. No worries, I'm sure there was a lot traffic from your bedroom to your living room.
